description: the nova-novnc script checks the CONF value of CONF.ssl_only before the command line is parsed.
title: nova-novnc does not parse cmd line args in the correct order

comments.content: the nova-novnc script checks the CONF value of CONF.ssl_only before the command line is parsed.

Fix proposed to branch: master

commit 5f5f8f616bb01527adb29f77483d7d3e7f1678c7
Author: Davanum Srinivas <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Mar 7 21:07:20 2013 -0500

    Check CONF values *after* command line args are parsed
    
    CONF.ssl_only will contain the default value till
    parse_args is called.
    
    Fix for LP# 1123540
    
    Change-Id: Ib80d39b883c8ce2d6b813ca2b76051dd95ffb2b6
